sentences.sContent: The study at the University of Tennessee selected 169 married couples under the age of 35 and asked them to fill in questionnaires every six months for four years.
sentences.sContent_eng: The study at the University of Tennessee selected 169 married couples under the age of 35 and asked them to fill in questionnaires every six months for four years.
sentences.sCn: 田纳西州大学的这项研究选取了169对35岁以下的已婚夫妇，在四年的时间里每隔6个月请他们填一份调查问卷。

sentences.sContent: The next day, after Al and I went for a jog in Little Rock, we flew to his hometown, Carthage, Tennessee, for a rally and a visit with his parents, both of whom had a large influence on him.
sentences.sContent_eng: The next day, after Al and I went for a jog in Little Rock, we flew to his hometown, Carthage, Tennessee, for a rally and a visit with his parents, both of whom had a large influence on him.
sentences.sCn: 第二天，艾尔和我一起在小石城里慢跑了一下，然后我们飞到他的家乡田纳西州的迦太基，参加一个集会，并拜见他的父母。 他的父母对他影响非常大。

sentences.sContent: Most of the other citizens in Tennessee disagreed with him. They decided to leave the Union.
sentences.sContent_eng: Most of the other citizens in Tennessee disagreed with him. They decided to leave the Union.
sentences.sCn: 然而，在田纳西州，绝大多数人都反对他的决定，他们决定脱离合众国。
